settings.text: Your Calm in Every Chaos
30 Day Money Back Guarantee
If you're unsatisfied with your shots, for any reason, we'll give you a full refund–no return necessary!

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text:
Key Ingredients in Calm Shot

  • L-Tyrosine (550 mg) – Supports cognitive function and helps manage stress.
  • Ashwagandha Root Extract (360 mg) – A well-known adaptogen that promotes relaxation and balances stress levels.
  • L-Theanine (300 mg) – Found in green tea, it helps induce a calm and focused state.
  • Magnesium (34 mg, from Magnesium Citrate) – Essential for muscle relaxation and overall nervous system support.
  • Passionfruit Extract (56 mg) – Naturally soothing and packed with antioxidants.
  • Vitamins (B6, B12, D3, Folic Acid) – Support brain function, mood balance, and overall well-being.

Additional Ingredients: Water, resistant dextrin, erythritol, malic acid, natural flavors (pineapple & guava), steviol glycosides, citric acid, xanthan gum, gum acacia, lecithin.

settings.title: How to use
settings.text:
HOW TO USE

Drink one shot daily to support relaxation and overall well-being, or take it before moments of stress or anxiety when you need extra calm and focus. Enjoy it straight from the bottle or over ice with sparkling water. Shake well before drinking.

STORAGE
Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight to preserve potency.

A QUICK NOTE
We recommend consulting your healthcare provider before adding any supplements to your routine, especially if you have any health conditions or are taking medications.

Have more questions? See our FAQs.
High Quality Ingredients
Incredible Taste
No Added Sugars
Formulated by Specialists
YOUR KEY TO Stress-Free Performance
INSTANT BENEFITS
Cortisol Reduction
Ashwagandha calms your stress response almost immediately.
Enhanced Focus
Feel mentally sharper when it matters most.
Emotional Balance
Stay positive and composed, no matter the pressure.
LONG-TERM ADVANTAGES
Build resilience to stress over time.
Improve overall emotional and physical well-being.
Enhance the quality of your sleep and energy levels.

settings.title: Magnesium Sulfate
settings.text: Eases physical tension caused by stress, promoting relaxation and balance.

settings.title: Support Long-Term Health
settings.text: Chronic high cortisol is linked to weight gain, fatigue, and weakened immunity. By lowering cortisol, Calm Shot protects your overall well-being.

settings.title: Enhanced Focus and Mental Clarity
settings.text: Balanced cortisol supports cognitive performance, keeping your mind sharp and clear during demanding moments.

settings.title: Boost Emotional Balance
settings.text: Excess cortisol can disrupt serotonin and dopamine production, leading to mood swings. Lower cortisol helps you stay positive and emotionally steady.

settings.title: Feel More Relaxed
settings.text: Lower cortisol reduces feelings of tension and helps you stay composed under pressure.

settings.title: Sleep Better
settings.text: High cortisol disrupts sleep patterns, leaving you drained. Calm Shot helps restore natural rhythms for deeper, more restorative rest.

settings.title: Powered by Ashwagandha
settings.text: This clinically proven adaptogen lowers cortisol by up to 30%, calming your body and mind.

settings.title:
HOW CALM SHOT LOWERS CORTISOL
and why it matters
settings.text: Cortisol, often called the "stress hormone," is your body's natural response to high-pressure situations. While it's helpful in short bursts, prolonged high cortisol levels can harm your health and performance.

settings.title: Convenient and Effective
settings.text: A sleek, single-serving bottle you can take anywhere.  Feel the calm and clarity within minutes.

settings.title: Clean, Clinically-Backed Formula
settings.text: A pure blend of adaptogens, amino acids, and vitamins and free from synthetic fillers, artificial preservatives,  and added sugars. Vegan-Friendly: crafted for ethical, modern wellness.

settings.title: Holistic Wellness
settings.text: Supports emotional balance, cognitive function, and physical energy—all in one shot.

settings.subtitle: REAL STORIES, REAL CALM.
settings.title: Before big presentations, Calm shot helps me feel confident and collected. It’s a lifesaver!

settings.title: YOUR CALM starts now
settings.body_text:
Don't let stress hold you back. With Calm Shot, you can approach every challenge with clarity, focus, and peace of mind.

Take control today! Try Calm Shot and experience the difference!

settings.text_section: Forget “a glass of wine”—elevate to an antioxidant celebration, without the alcohol. Each shot delivers 220 mg of 98% purity Resveratrol, equal to 43 bottles of red wine. Toast to vibrant health and longevity with every sip.

settings.question: HOW DOES CALM SHOT WORK?
settings.answer: Calm Shot is formulated with clinically proven ingredients like Ashwagandha, L-Theanine, and Magnesium Sulfate that help reduce cortisol levels, promote relaxation, and enhance mental clarity. It’s designed to prepare your body and mind for stressful moments without making you drowsy.

settings.question: WHEN SHOULD I TAKE CALM SHOT?
settings.answer: Drink Calm Shot 15–30 minutes before high-stress activities like meetings, deadlines, exams, or travel. It helps you feel calm, focused, and ready to perform.

settings.question: HOW OFTEN CAN I TAKE CALM SHOT?
settings.answer: Calm Shot is safe to take whenever needed, but it’s most effective when used before moments of stress or activities requiring focus and clarity.

settings.question: WILL CALM SHOT MAKE ME SLEEPY?
settings.answer: No! Calm Shot promotes relaxation without sedation. Ingredients like L-Theanine and Magnesium Sulfate help calm your nerves while keeping your mind sharp and alert.

settings.question: IS CALM SHOT SAFE?
settings.answer: Yes, Calm Shot is made with clean, natural ingredients and is free from added sugars, artificial preservatives, and synthetic fillers. However, consult your healthcare provider if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medications, or have a medical condition. Calm Shot is not intended for individuals under 18.

settings.question: WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF REDUCING CORTISOL WITH CALM SHOT?
settings.answer:
Reducing cortisol helps:

  • Lower stress and tension.
  • Improve focus and mental clarity.
  • Balance your mood.
  • Enhance sleep quality.
  • Support long-term physical and emotional well-being.

settings.question: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO FEEL THE EFFECTS?
settings.answer: Many users report feeling calmer and more focused within 15–30 minutes of drinking Calm Shot.

settings.question: CAN I TAKE CALM SHOT WITH OTHER SUPPLEMENTS?
settings.answer: Yes, Calm Shot’s clean formula integrates seamlessly into most wellness routines. If you’re unsure about interactions, consult your healthcare provider.

settings.question: DOES CALM SHOT TASTE GOOD?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Calm Shot features a light, refreshing passion fruit flavor that’s easy to enjoy on its own or with your favorite beverage.

settings.question: WHERE IS CALM SHOT MADE?
settings.answer: Calm Shot is proudly crafted under the rigorous quality standards of Happy Aging in Miami, FL, using responsibly sourced, high-quality ingredients.
